duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead in coordinating business process analyses, needs assessment, and cost/benefit analyses for IT solutions alignment
Provide leadership in coordinating with the System Architect team on container orchestration and cloud solutions in a hybrid cloud environment
Design, maintain, and guide the development of scalable data architectures for the OIS
Lead data management, security, and migration initiatives, and provide direction for a team of database administrators and specialists
Identify opportunities to enhance data management systems and prepare for growth
Assist in the development of policies for standardizing systems, development tools, and security practices
Guide the design, modeling, documentation, and logical relationship of data and database changes for complex applications
Identify requirements, research options, design and implement solutions at a leadership level for the application portfolio
Perform technical planning, system integration, verification and validation, cost and risk assessments for database-related initiatives
Research, design, develop, and promote solutions to enhance the modern development environment

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)

Certification: Directive 8570.1/8140 - IAT II: Baseline Certification: Security+ and AWS Certified Solutions Architect or similar equivalent Cloud environment certification (if not in hand, must be obtained within 6 months of onboarding)
